lead_paragraph: The police said the Norwegian man, Kjartan Sekkingstad, whose fellow Canadian hostages were both beheaded this year, had been freed by the group for a ransom.

headline.print_headline: Philippine Militants Release Norwegian Held for a Year
headline.main: Abu Sayyaf Militants Release Norwegian Hostage in Philippines

snippet: The police said the Norwegian man, Kjartan Sekkingstad, whose fellow Canadian hostages were both beheaded this year, had been freed by the group for a ransom....
